RAD_LOVS.LOV_QUERY: SELECT c.Module, m.Module_Desc, c.Class_Code, c.Class_Description, c.Restriction_Type,c.Restriction_Type2 FROM Oltms_Class c, Smtbs_Modules m WHERE c.Module = m.Module_Id AND m.Module_Id IN ('OL', 'LB', 'LP', 'FC', 'TL') AND c.Class_Type = 'CB' AND c.Record_Stat = 'O' AND c.Once_Auth = 'Y' ORDER BY Module, Class_Code
SELECT BRANCH_CODE,BRANCH_NAME FROM OLTMS_BRANCH WHERE RECORD_STAT='O' AND ONCE_AUTH='Y' ORDER BY BRANCH_CODE
SELECT CCY_CODE,CCY_NAME FROM CYTMS_CCY_DEFN WHERE RECORD_STAT='O' AND ONCE_AUTH='Y' ORDER BY CCY_CODE
SELECT CCY_CODE,CCY_NAME FROM CYTMS_CCY_DEFN WHERE RECORD_STAT='O' AND ONCE_AUTH='Y' ORDER BY CCY_CODE

SELECT c.Class_Code, c.Class_Description, c.Restriction_Type, c.Restriction_Type2 FROM Oltms_Class c WHERE c.Module = ? AND c.Class_Type = 'CB' AND c.Record_Stat = 'O' AND c.Once_Auth = 'Y' ORDER BY Class_Code
